alert.note: Alert for Laurens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Laurens, west central Emanuel, Treutlen and southeastern Johnson Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 138 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Scott, or 11 miles north of Soperton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Soperton, Adrian, Lothair, Orland, Rockledge, Orianna, Norristown, Barnhill, Meeks, Blackville, Zaidee, Gillis Springs, and Scott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
